document.docAuthor: Lucinda, Paulo Henrique Franco & Reis, Roberto E.
document.masterDocTitle: Systematics of the subfamily Poeciliinae Bonaparte (Cyprinodontiformes: Poeciliidae), with an emphasis on the tribe Cnesterodontini Hubbs

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Systematics of the subfamily Poeciliinae Bonaparte (Cyprinodontiformes: Poeciliidae), with an emphasis on the tribe Cnesterodontini Hubbs

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

subSubSection.paragraph:

Rivas ,

,

Rivas ,

,

Rivas ,

Distribution. Northern USA to Colombia (Inland, Gulf and Pacific drainages) including the Caribbean Islands.
